joiner.custom-separator:
{% set separator = joiner(' |') %}
{% for item in items %}{{ separator() }} {{ item }}{% endfor %}
joiner.default:
{% set separator = joiner() %}
{% for item in items %}{{ separator() }} {{ item }}{% endfor %}

range.float-step: {% for i in range(5, 10, 2.5) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}
range.negative-start: {% for i in range(-5, 5) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}
range.negative-step: {% for i in range(10, 5, -1) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}
range.start-stop-step: {% for i in range(5, 10, 2) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}
range.start-stop: {% for i in range(5, 10) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}
range.stop: {% for i in range(10) %}{{ i }} {% endfor %}

raw.multiple: {% raw %}{{ varX }}{% endraw %}{{ varY }}{% raw %}{{ varZ }}{% endraw %}

spaceless.pre:
{% spaceless %} 
Formatted text

with empty lines
    and tabs
{% endspaceless %}
spaceless.textarea: {% spaceless %} {% endspaceless %}

verbatim.multiple: {% verbatim %}{{ varX }}{% endverbatim %}{{ varY }}{% verbatim %}{{ varZ }}{% endverbatim %}
